overview:
Nik Wekwerth has been working in technology since 1989 and in the software industry since 2000. He currently holds the position of Vice President of Marketing at Librato where he is responsible for leading overall marketing direction and product management at Librato.

Nik started his career at Siemens AG in telecommunications. His focus shifted to software when joining Wind River systems after moving to the US in 2000. Since then he has worked at several start-ups that spanned the solar, advertising and technology sectors where he lead the companies in the adoption of Software-as-a-Service strategies and online sales and marketing efforts.

Nik earned his MBA from IESE in Barcelona, Spain and holds a Masters of Science, Electrical Engineering from the Polytechnic University in Berlin, Germany.
